Flow.description: Updated for SF-1114. Includes Create SOA

formulas.description: If blank sets the Last Outreach Attempt number to 0
formulas.name: f_LastOutreachAttemptNumber
f_LossReason_Opp
formulas.expression: IF(AND({!f_Stage_Opp}="Closed Lost",{!f_OutreachDisposition} = "UTR"),"Unable to Reach", IF(AND({!f_Stage_Opp}="Closed Lost",{!f_OutreachDisposition} = "Deceased"),"Deceased", IF(AND({!f_Stage_Opp}="Closed Lost",{!f_OutreachDisposition} = "No Interest"),"No Interest", IF(AND({!f_Stage_Opp}="Closed Lost",{!f_OutreachDisposition} = "Closed-Other"),"Other", IF(AND({!f_Stage_Opp}="Closed Lost",{!f_OutreachDisposition} = "Already Enrolled with CPHL"),"Already Enrolled with CPHL","")))))

formulas.description: Counts number of Outreach Attempts and is only applied when the Disposition = UTR
formulas.name: f_OutreachAttempt_Count
f_OutreachDisposition
formulas.expression:
IF({!SpokeTo.value}="Voicemail","UTR", IF({!SpokeTo.value}="No answer","UTR", IF(AND({!SpokeTo.value}="Prospect or authorized rep",{!PermissionLSAFU}={!Choice_Yes}),"Confirmed Interest", IF({!Outreach_Disposition_NoLSA_NoMail_Button}<> "",{!Outreach_Disposition_NoLSA_NoMail_Button}, IF({!Outreach_Dispostion_Maybe_MailInfo}<> "",{!Outreach_Dispostion_Maybe_MailInfo}, IF({!Member_requested_not_to_be_contacted_regarding_Medicare}=TRUE,"No Interest",
IF({!Outreach_Disposition_NotProspect_Button}={!Choice_OD_UTR},"UTR", IF({!Outreach_Disposition_NotProspect_Button} <> "",{!Outreach_Disposition_NotProspect_Button}, IF(AND({!SpokeTo.value}="Prospect or authorized rep",{!PermissionLSAFU}={!Choice_No},{!InformationMailed}={!Choice_Yes},{!PermissionLSAFU2}={!Choice_Yes}),"Confirmed Interest",
IF(AND({!SpokeTo.value}="Prospect or authorized rep",{!PermissionLSAFU}={!Choice_Maybe},{!Reason_For_Not_Continuing}={!Choice_MailInfo},{!PermissionLSAFU2}={!Choice_Yes}),"Follow-Up Requested",
IF(AND({!SpokeTo.value}="Prospect or authorized rep",{!PermissionLSAFU}={!Choice_Maybe},{!Reason_For_Not_Continuing}={!Choice_CallLater}),"Follow-Up Requested",
IF(AND({!SpokeTo.value}="Prospect or authorized rep",{!PermissionLSAFU}={!Choice_No},{!InformationMailed}={!Choice_No}),"No Interest",""))))))))))))

formulas.name: f_Stage_Opp
formulas.expression: IF({!f_OutreachDisposition} ="Deceased","Closed Lost", IF({!f_OutreachDisposition} ="Closed-Other","Closed Lost", IF({!f_OutreachDisposition} ="Already Enrolled with CPHL","Closed Lost", IF({!f_OutreachDisposition} ="No Interest","Closed Lost", IF(AND({!f_OutreachDisposition} ="UTR",{!f_OutreachAttempt_Count}={!Get_Max_Outreach_Attempts.MaxAttemptCount__c}),"Closed Lost",TEXT({!Get_Account_ID_from_Opp.StageName}))))))

Flow.label: MSS Outbound Educational Outreach

fields.name: Relationship_of_Authorized_Rep_to_Member
fields.fieldText: Relationship of Authorized Rep to Member

fields.name: Member_requested_not_to_be_contacted_regarding_Medicare
fields.fieldText: Member requested not to be contacted regarding Medicare

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: ((1 OR 2) AND 4) OR ((3 AND 5) AND 4 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8)

fields.name: NotesAboutServiceReportIssue
fields.fieldText: Please ensure that you've filled out the Notes about Service(s) field above.

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_AdditionalMLTCServices
textTemplates.text:
{!v_AccountSalutation} {!v_AccountName} now that we know what services you receive; I would like to tell you about some additional services that Centers Plan MLTC provides. If you think you can benefit from any of these services, you can let me know today or you can call me at any time in the future and we’ll see if we can help you take advantage of them. [REVIEW MLTC SERVICES]


  1. In-home Health Services (Nurses, Home Health Aides, Physical Therapists)
  2. In-home Personal Care (Bathing, dressing, shopping)
  3. Adult Day Health Care & Social Day Care
  4. Transportation to Medical Appointments
  5. Additional Services (Home-Delivered Meals, Personal Emergency Response)

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_DiscussMLTCServices
textTemplates.text:
{!v_AccountSalutation} {!v_AccountName} it is my job to make sure you are taking advantage of the services you currently receive and to help identify additional services that you may be eligible to receive.


Your full Medicaid benefits currently cover you for the needed long term care services you are receiving. But I also see that you have Medicare which may qualify you for ADDITIONAL BENEFITS through one of our Medicare Advantage Plans. We have TWO Medicare Advantage plans you qualify for, would you like me to provide you with an overview of each plan?

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_DiscussMLTCServices_YES
textTemplates.text:
Centers Plan for Dual Coverage Care:


Our Dual Special Needs plan is a plan that give you coverage for your doctor visits, hospital stays, and prescriptions. But this coverage goes beyond regular Medicaid and Medicare, which provides extra benefits such as, an Over the Counter card (OTC) with $140 monthly for eligible non-prescription items like vitamins, laxatives, first aid products, etc. The plan provides you with both routine and comprehensive dental benefits, transportation coverage at no cost to you, and many other benefits.


Our other plan that you qualify for is:


Centers Plan for Medicaid Advantage Plus


Our Centers Plan for Medicaid Advantage Plus plan also known as MAP, this plan combines your Medicare benefits, Medicaid benefits, and your long term care benefits into one convenient plan. This allows you to obtain all your covered coordinated services from ONE plan. With this plan, you will be assigned a Care Manager to help coordinate all your needed services, you receive an Over the Counter card (OTC) with $120 monthly for eligible non-prescription items like vitamins, laxatives, first aid products, etc., comprehensive dental, transportation and acupuncture among other benefits at no cost to you.

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_InfoMailed
textTemplates.text: Do I have your consent to mail you some educational materials?

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_LSAFU2
textTemplates.text: Would it be okay to have someone follow up in a week to answer any questions you may have?

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_LSAFU2_No
textTemplates.text: [Thank them for their time and conclude the call with "Thank you for your time".]

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_LSAFU2_Yes
textTemplates.text: [Inform them that a Licensed Medicare Representative will call them a week from today, then thank them for their time and conclude the call with "Thank you for your time."]

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_LSAFU_Maybe
textTemplates.text:
[If at this point the prospect is not sure about which plan he/she would be interested in, go back to the BENEFIT INFO section and explain.]


[If they can't make a decision right now, inquire when would be the best time to contact them again.]


  • When would be a convenient time for us to call back?
  • What is your best contact number?
  • Ask if they would like some information mailed. "Do I have your consent to mail you some educational materials?"

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_LSAFU_No_Validation
textTemplates.text:
[Ask the prospect, "It's been a pleasure speaking with you today, thanks so much for your time. I hope you don't mind, but may I ask why you don't want to learn more about our plans?]


If their concern is something similar to the following:

  • They assume to have to pay out of pocket costs or they thought they'd have to switch PCP, Explain that a License Medicare Agent can clarify all their concerns/questions.
  • They don't want to switch their current insurer or they have union benefits in which they are satisfied with.


[Ask if they would like some information mailed.]

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_LSAFU_Yes
textTemplates.text:
[Please note: During COVID-19 circumstances we will not be offering in person appointments or visits.]


[COVID-19 Script]

With your permission, I would like to have a Licensed Medicare Representative call you to explain the plan benefits in more detail and answer any questions you may have.


[Business as Usual Script]

With your permission, I would like to have a Licensed Medicare Representative call you to explain the plan benefits in more detail and answer any questions you may have or I can also set up an appointment for an agent to meet with you in person if you prefer.


[Please note if the prospect expresses an interest in our MAP, explain that an in-person appointment is required/mandatory.]

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_MaxOutreach
textTemplates.text: This Outreach Attempt will close the Opportunity due to reaching the Max UTR Attempts.

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_NextOutreachDue
textTemplates.text: The Next Outreach Attempt will be set for {!Calculate_Next_Outreach_Due_Date}

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_PermissionLSAFU_Yes
textTemplates.text: Find out if they would like to have a Licensed Medicare Representative call within the next 24 hours or at some time later in the week

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_PointOfCall
textTemplates.text: Would you be interested in learning more about either of the two plans explained to you?

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_Rapport
textTemplates.text:
My name is {!f_CurrentUserName}, I’m a Medicare Support Specialist at Centers Plan for Healthy Living—the company that provides your Medicaid Managed Long Term Care. I would like to thank you {!v_AccountSalutation} {!v_AccountName} for being a member with Centers Plan.


[Build rapport here with questions and comments such as those below but avoid talking about plan specifics:]


  • How are you feeling today?
  • How is your day going?
  • I'm glad you are feeling well / that your day is going well.

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_Salutation
textTemplates.text:
<Good Morning/Good Afternoon/Good Evening> May I please speak to {!v_AccountSalutation} {!v_AccountName}?


[If it is not the member ask the caller:] Are you the member's Authorized Representative?

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_SpokeTo_NoAnswer
textTemplates.text: Set a follow-up phone call

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_SpokeTo_NotProspect
textTemplates.text:
Leave a message stating your name, title and the fact that you are calling from Centers Plan for Healthy Living to thank them for being a member of our MLTC plan and to educate them about some additional plan options that they may qualify for. 


Leave your contact phone number and call center hours of operation with instructions to speak to someone else if you are not available. 


Do not provide any further information (HIPAA). 


ALSO, ask for the best time to call back when {!v_AccountSalutation} {!v_AccountName} will be home and set a follow-up phone call.

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_SpokeTo_Voicemail
textTemplates.text:
Leave a message stating your name, title and the fact that you are calling from Centers Plan for Healthy Living to thank them for being a member of our MLTC plan and to educate them about some additional plan options that they may qualify for. 


Leave your contact phone number (718-697-6147) and call center hours of operation (9:00 am - 5:00 pm). 


Please note: During AEP, Hours of Operation will be 8:00 am - 8:00 pm

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_ThankYou
textTemplates.text: Thank you for your time.

textTemplates.name: tt_Script_WheretoSendMail
textTemplates.text: Which address would you like us to mail information to?
